poem:
"Ode to a Silver Screen Adventure"

In the high-school halls of Bottoms, laughter rings,
Golden Globe and Emmy queen, in cinema's offerings.
No bear this time, but harebrained plan takes wing,
A fight club formed, from love's yearn - such wild beginnings.
Challenging norms, echoed through comic sings,
A film where bravery, in comedy, is just the beginning.
